title: Hereâ€™s how you can dual-boot Windows 11 on the Microsoft Surface Duo
content:
Many of you probably dual-boot your PCs – be it to run a Linux distribution alongside Windows or because you have a Mac and want to play some games through Windows. On traditional x86 computers, the process has gotten relatively simpler over time. On Android, however, the story is different. The modern x86 platform usually

The post Here’s how you can dual-boot Windows 11 on the Microsoft Surface Duo appeared first on xda-developers.
description: A developer is working on turning a Microsoft Surface Duo into a Windows 11 foldable, and it may actually be possible to do just that.
